name: Caracas Outdoor Bar Plan – 8x5 Backyard Tiki Bar with Roof & Counter
open_features: (4) 18×18×12 in reinforced concrete footings supporting 6×6 SP No.2 posts
Beams: (2) 2×8 SP No.2, full 12 ft length
Fascia boards: 2×8 SP No.2 around roof perimeter
Framed counter with 2×6 plates and 2×4 blocking
Wall framing: 2×6 SP No.2 studs @16 in O.C.
Roof sheathing: 3/4 in OSB T&G panels
Wall and ceiling finish: T1-11 siding 4×8×3/4 in panels
Concrete slab-on-grade: 4 in thick with W4/W4 welded wire reinforcement
Hardware: Simpson ABU66Z post bases, H2.5A hurricane ties, 1/2 in SDS screws, and galvanized washers
safety_note: Details noted are preliminary; verify slab reinforcement, wind tie connections, and local code compliance with a licensed professional before construction.
